import "./ahc.css" export default function Ahc2() { return (

How your habits shape your identity (and Vice Versa)

  • Its hard to change habits if you do not change your underlying beliefs that led to past behavior
  • If you prioritise comfort over accomplishment, youâ€™ll be drawn to relaxing rather than training
  • You might start a habit because of motivation, but the only reason you will stick with one is it if becomes part of your identity
  • Your habits are how you embody your identity
  • When you write each day, you embody the identity of a creative person
  • When you train each day, you embody the identity of a athletic person
  • When you make your bed each day, you embody the identity of an organised person
  • New identities require evidence
  • Decide the person you want to be (Ask each time, What would a [insert_identity] person do?)
  • Prove it to yourself with small wins
) }
